member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverter
member.summary: Supports conversion from any type of document to another using SVG, OCR and Raster technologies.

member.summary: Sets the engine instance to use when converting documents using OCR.

member.summary: Saves each page in a separate file regardless of the final document format.
member.value: **true** to save each page in a separate file regardless of the final document format; otherwise, **false**.

member.value: A string that contains the template to use for the individual file names when the output format does not support multipages.

member.summary: Indicates how to treat the image elements encountered in the input SVG page during the conversion.
member.value: A value that indicate how to treat the image elements encountered in the input SVG page during the conversion. Default value is

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterOptions.UseThreads
member.summary: Indicates whether to use multiple threads during the conversion.
member.value: **true** to use multiple threads during the conversion; otherwise, **false**. Default value is **true**.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of this class.

member.summary: Creates an exact clone of this object.
member.returns: An exact clone of this object.

member.summary: Aborts this job.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.AnnotationsMode
member.summary: Annotation conversion options.
member.value: Annotation conversion options. The default value is DocumentConverterAnnotationsMode.None.

member.summary: Document converter to use with this job.

member.summary: Document converter options to use with this job.
member.value: The document converter options to use with this job. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.DocumentFormat
member.summary: Output format to use for document conversion.
member.value: The output format to use for document conversion. Default value is DocumentFormat.User.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.DocumentWriterOptions
member.summary: Options for the document writer to use with this job.
member.value: The options for the document writer to use with this job. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.ErrorMessages
member.summary: Any error messages occurred during the conversion.
member.value: Any error messages occurred during the conversion. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.InputCache
member.summary: Cache containing the input document.
member.value: The cache containing the input document. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.InputCacheConfiguration
member.summary: Configuration of the cache containing the input document.
member.value: The configuration of the cache containing the input document. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.InputDocumentFirstPageNumber
member.summary: Number of the first page to be converted from the input document
member.value: The 1-based number of the first page to be converted from the input document. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.InputDocumentId
member.summary: ID of the input document to convert.
member.value: The ID of the input document to convert. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.InputDocumentLastPageNumber
member.summary: Number of the last page to be converted from the input document
member.value: The 1-based number of the last page to be converted from the input document. A value of -1 means to use the last page in the document. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.InputDocumentUserToken
member.summary: User token associated with the input document.
member.value: The user token associated with the input document. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.IsCompleted
member.summary: Checks whether the conversion job has finished.
member.value: **true** if the conversion has finished; otherwise, **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.summary: Indicates the timestamp when this job has completed.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.JobName
member.summary: Optional job name.
member.value: The optional job name.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.JobStartedTimestamp
member.summary: Indicates the timestamp when this job started.
member.value: The timestamp when this job has started. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.JobStatus
member.summary: Final job status.

member.summary: Current status message.
member.value: The current status message. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.JobStatusPageNumber
member.summary: The page number currently being converted.
member.value: The page number currently being converted. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobData.JobStatusTimestamp

member.summary: Data of the job set into this runner being run or ready to be run.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobDataRunner.MinifyCacheItem
member.summary: IndicateS whether to minify the data stored in the cache for each status.
member.value: **true** to minify the data stored in the cache for each status; otherwise, **false**. The default value is **true**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobDataRunner.OcrEngine
member.summary: OCR engine instance being used by this job.
member.value: The OCR engine instance being used by this job.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobDataRunner.OutputCache
member.summary: Cache to store the result output document of the conversion.
member.value: The cache to store the result output document of the conversion.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.StatusJobDataRunner.StatusCache
member.summary: Cache used for storing the job status.
member.value: The cache used for storing the job status.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterAnnotationsMode
member.summary: Annotation conversion options.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterAnnotationsMode.None
member.summary: Do not save any annotations.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterAnnotationsMode.External
member.summary: Export the annotations to an external file.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterAnnotationsMode.Overlay
member.summary: Overlay the annotations over the image (raster conversion only).

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterAnnotationsMode.Embed
member.summary: Embed the annotations in the final document (for PDF and TIFF file formats only).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterConversionModes
member.summary: Types of conversions that were used during the operation of this job.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterConversionModes.None
member.summary: None. The job did not start yet or an error occurred prior to any specific conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterConversionModes.SVG
member.summary: SVG conversion was used.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterConversionModes.OCR
member.summary: OCR conversion was used.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterConversionModes.Raster
member.summary: Raster conversion was used.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterEmptyPageMode
member.summary: Controls how empty pages are treated during the conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterEmptyPageMode.None
member.summary: Empty page will be added to the document and no checking is performed.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterEmptyPageMode.Skip
member.summary: Skip empty pages. The page is considered not empty if the annotations container for page contains items.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterEmptyPageMode.SkipIgnoreAnnotations
member.summary: Skip empty pages. The page is considered empty even if the annotations container for page contains items.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobErrorMode
member.summary: Controls how the engine handles errors that may occur during conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobErrorMode.Abort
member.summary: Abort the conversion job.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobErrorMode.Continue
member.summary: Continue on non-critical errors.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation
member.summary: Document converter operation.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.Started
member.summary: The conversion has started. Only with the DocumentConverterJobs.JobStarted event.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.Completed
member.summary: The conversion has completed. Only with the DocumentConverterJobs.JobCompleted event.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.CreateDocument
member.summary: A new LEADDocument object is created from InputDocumentFileName.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.BeginDocumentWriter
member.summary: DocumentWriter.BeginDocument is called to create the output document. Document conversion only.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.EndDocumentWriter
member.summary: DocumentWriter.EndDocument is called to finalize the output document. Document conversion only.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.Other
member.summary: General operation.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.LoadRasterPage
member.summary: DocumentPage.GetImage is called get the raster image of a page. Document and Raster conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.SaveRasterPage
member.summary: is called to save the page image. Raster conversion only.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.LoadSvgPage
member.summary: DocumentPage.GetSvg is called get the SVG image of a page. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.AddDocumentPage
member.summary: DocumentWriter.AddPage is called to add a page to the document. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.PreprocessPage
member.summary: AutoPreprocess is called to pre-process the page.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.CreateOcrDocument
member.summary: object. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.AddOcrPage
member.summary: AddPage(RasterImage,OcrProgressCallback) object. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.AutoZoneOcrPage
member.summary: IOcrPage.AutoZone is called. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.RecognizeOcrPage
member.summary: IOcrPage.Recognize is called. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.SaveOcrPage
member.summary: IOcrDocument.Save with a single page is called. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.SaveOcrDocument
member.summary: IOcrDocument.Save is called. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.ConvertOcrDocument
member.summary: DocumentWriter.Convert is during OCR conversion called. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.LoadAnnotations
member.summary: AnnCodecs.Load is called to load the annotations from the input document or external input annotations file.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.SaveAnnotations
member.summary: AnnCodecs.Save is called to save the annotations to the external output annotations file.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.EmbedAnnotations
member.summary: The annotations are being embedded into the output document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.ConvertDocument
member.summary: DocumentWriter.Convert is called during SVG conversion. Document conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.OverlayAnnotations
member.summary: The annotations is being overlayed on top of the page.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.BeginUploadDocument
member.summary: The document converter is calling DocumentFactory.BeginUpload preparing to begin uploading the document to the cache.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.UploadDocument
member.summary: The document converter is calling DocumentFactory.UploadDocument to upload the document to the cache.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.UploadAnnotations
member.summary: The document converter is calling DocumentFactory.UploadAnnotations to upload the annotations of the document to the cache.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.EndUploadDocument
member.summary: The document converter is calling DocumentFactory.EndUpload to finish uploading the document to the cache.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobOperation.LinearizeDocument
member.summary: The document is a PDF and is being linearized (optimized for fast web viewing).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobStatus
member.summary: Job status.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobStatus.Success
member.summary: The job is successful.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobStatus.SuccessWithErrors
member.summary: The job is partially successful.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobStatus.Aborted
member.summary: The job was not successful and is aborted.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterSvgImagesRecognitionMode
member.summary: Determines how image elements inside SVG documents are treated during SVG conversion.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterSvgImagesRecognitionMode.Auto
member.summary: Use SVG engine unless the page is full raster.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterSvgImagesRecognitionMode.Disabled
member.summary: Do not use OCR recognition for the image elements. Instead, the image element is added as is to the final document.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterSvgImagesRecognitionMode.Always
member.summary: Use OCR recognition on the image elements. The recognition data is added to the final document with the rest of the other SVG elements of the page. Requires a valid IOcrEngine set in the converter using SetOcrEngineInstance.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData
member.summary: Data for a document converter job.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.AnnotationsMode
member.summary: Controls how annotations are saved in the output document.
member.value: A DocumentConverterAnnotationsMode enumeration value that controls how annotations are saved in the output document. Default value is

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.Cache
member.summary: Cache that contains the document ID to use as the input of the conversion.
member.value: Cache that contains the document ID to use as the input of the conversion. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.Document
member.summary: LEADDocument object to be used as the input of the conversion.
member.value: The LEADDocument object to be used as the input of the conversion. If this value is not **null**,

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.DocumentFormat
member.summary: Output format to use for document conversion.
member.value: The output format to use for document conversion.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.DocumentId
member.summary: The ID of the LEADDocument object to be used as the input of the conversion.
member.value: The ID of LEADDocument object to be used as the input of the conversion. If this value is not **null**,

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.InputAnnotationsFileName
member.summary: Path to the file containing the annotations file to be added to the output document. Optional.
member.value: The path to the file containing the annotations file to be added to the output document. This is an optional value and will be used

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.InputDocumentFileName
member.summary: Path to the input file for the conversion. Either this or Document are used.
member.value: The path to the input file for the conversion. If this value is not **null**, then it will be used as the input document for

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.InputDocumentFirstPageNumber
member.summary: Number of the first page to be converted from the input document
member.value: The 1-based number of the first page to be converted from the input document. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.InputDocumentLastPageNumber
member.summary: Number of the last page to be converted from the input document
member.value: The 1-based number of the last page to be converted from the input document. A value of -1 means to use the last page in the document. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.JobName
member.summary: Optional job name.
member.value: The optional job name.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.OutputAnnotationsFileName
member.summary: Name of the file that will contain the annotations parsed from the input document. Optional.
member.value: The name to the file that will contain the annotations parsed from the input document. Optional.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.OutputAnnotationsStream
member.summary: Stream that will contain the annotations parsed from the input document. Optional.
member.value: Stream that will contain the annotations parsed from the input document. Optional. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.OutputDocumentFileName
member.summary: Name of the output file generated by this conversion.
member.value: Name of the output file generated by this conversion.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.OutputDocumentStream
member.summary: Stream to hold the output file generated by this conversion.
member.value: Stream to hold the output file generated by this conversion. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.RasterImageBitsPerPixel
member.summary: Bits per pixel to use for the output document when raster conversion is used.
member.value: The bits per pixel to use for the output document when raster conversion is used. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.RasterImageFormat
member.summary: Output format to use for raster conversion.
member.value: The output format to use for raster conversion.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.UploadDocumentOptions
member.summary: Options to use for automatically uploading the converted document to the cache.
member.value: Options to use for automatically upload the converted document to the cache. Default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.UserData
member.summary: Optional user-defined object that can be used a long side the job events to pass application specified data.
member.value: The optional user-defined object that can be used a long side the job events to pass application specified data.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobData.UserToken
member.summary: User token associated with the document.
member.value: The user token associated with the document. The default value is **null**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobError
member.summary: Contains information on an document converter job error

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobError.Error
member.summary: The exception that was thrown (if any).
member.value: The System.Exception object that was thrown and caught by the engine. May be a **null** value.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobError.InputDocumentPageNumber
member.summary: The 1-based number of the page in the input document file that caused the error.
member.value: The 1-based number of the page in the input document file that caused the error.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Document.Converter.DocumentConverterJobError.Operation
member.summary: The operation that was running when the error occured.
member.value: An DocumentConverterJobOperation enumeration member that specifies the operation that was running when the error occured.
